** 20 《堯曰篇第二十》

20.1堯曰：¶
「咨！¶
爾舜！¶
天之厤數在爾躬，¶	KR1h0004_020:1a:4:1:0
允執其中。¶	KR1a0013_001:21a:5:3:1,KR1a0033_004:38a:3:15:2,KR1a0041_033:14a:4:20:0,KR1a0041_037:15a:2:20:0,KR1a0102_006:27a:3:2:0,KR1a0102_011:16b:5:12:0,KR1a0102_013:16b:3:16:0,KR1a0113_001:47a:8:33:10,KR1a0123_004:22a:4:13:5,KR1a0130_017:6b:1:1:0,KR1a0136_006:57a:7:14:1,KR1a0136_009:2b:8:5:1,KR1a0136_010:27b:2:13:1,KR1a0139_039:30a:8:18:359,KR1a0139_043:29a:4:10:333,KR1a0154_001:20a:6:19:2,KR1b0001_059:151a:4:1:150,KR1b0003_011:13a:13:15:2,KR1b0004_011:6b:5:4:6,KR1b0004_011:16a:2:8:6,KR1b0007_024:41b:8:13:1,KR1b0007_030:22a:1:11:1,KR1b0007_030:22a:2:7:1,KR1b0007_030:22a:3:1:1,KR1b0010_008:9a:2:5:0,KR1b0011_003:29b:4:18:1,KR1b0014_001:21b:4:38:1,KR1b0017_001:26a:7:29:12,KR1b0024_002:10a:5:4:1,KR1b0027_001:55a:4:35:18,KR1b0027_001:55a:6:23:18,KR1b0027_001:59a:5:27:18,KR1b0029_003:71a:7:41:27,KR1b0029_003:77a:5:21:27,KR1b0030_005:21b:2:2:52,KR1b0032_001:18a:5:4:34,KR1b0032_001:18a:7:4:34,KR1b0032_001:20b:5:5:34,KR1b0034_003:15b:4:14:25,KR1b0036_001:12a:2:33:15,KR1b0036_001:35b:3:35:17,KR1b0037_002:21b:3:9:21,KR1b0037_002:27b:7:33:21,KR1b0038_002:18a:5:20:33,KR1b0038_002:24a:5:11:39,KR1b0038_002:24a:7:11:39,KR1b0038_002:26b:5:1:39,KR1b0040_002:6b:4:6:1,KR1b0040_003:35a:6:18:1,KR1b0041_001:4a:3:9:1,KR1b0046_004:8a:4:27:22,KR1b0046_005:22b:4:27:13,KR1b0046_005:26b:4:22:13,KR1b0048_002:75a:8:8:15,KR1b0048_007:26b:5:17:7,KR1b0048_007:27b:4:16:7,KR1b0048_007:27b:5:12:7,KR1b0048_007:27b:6:9:7,KR1b0048_008:33a:4:1:6,KR1b0051_002:3a:1:4:7,KR1b0051_016:25a:1:7:6,KR1c0013_026:15a:2:17:0,KR1c0044_022:37a:6:20:163,KR1d0051_066:4b:7:14:3,KR1d0051_066:34a:8:6:21,KR1d0057_123:9b:8:10:8,KR1d0057_124:21a:3:9:0,KR1d0057_124:32a:8:9:0,KR1e0048_000:4a:4:15:32,KR1e0060_000:22a:2:15:163,KR1e0072_001:60b:8:26:11,KR1g0009_010:10a:4:13:3,KR1g0018_002:29a:4:5:34,KR1h0004_020:1a:5:1:0,KR1h0005_010:9a:2:5:0,KR1h0006_010:14b:7:20:23,KR1h0006_010:16b:4:25:23,KR1h0007_020:1a:10:20:5,KR1h0007_020:2b:8:35:5,KR1h0012_010:13b:5:13:44,KR1h0015_009:6b:5:13:6,KR1h0016_025:2a:2:4:6,KR1h0017_020:1a:9:13:5,KR1h00 曰：¶

寬則得眾，¶	KR1h0004_017:12a:18:1:10,KR1h0004_020:7a:1:1:3

公則說。

「何如

「尊五美，¶

子張曰：¶

「因民之所利而利之，¶	KR1a0058_004:83b:5:19:1,KR1a0075_010:24b:2:8:0,KR1a0079_002:36b:5:34:0,KR1a0095_002:54b:7:20:1,KR1a0095_010:37b:3:3:3,KR1a0102_004:34b:6:18:0,KR1a0116_010:13b:2:3:13,KR1a0142_007:13b:1:4:114,KR1a0142_008:2a:4:12:10,KR1a0151_007:17a:8:4:0,KR1b0004_019:8b:3:11:4,KR1b0040_002:39b:5:8:1,KR1d0068_017:45a:5:11:4,KR1g0009_010:11b:2:10:3,KR1g0014_001:4b:8:12:1,KR1h0004_020:8a:18:1:6,KR1h0005_010:11a:5:5:0,KR1h0006_010:19a:3:18:24,KR1h0007_020:5b:3:15:6,KR1h0007_020:6b:1:31:6,KR1h0012_010:19b:1:9:50,KR1h0015_009:8a:1:5:6,KR1h0015_016:4b:7:11:4,KR1h0017_020:7a:3:9:24,KR1h0017_020:7b:1:4:24,KR1h0017_020:8a:5:14:26,KR1h0019_003:83b:8:9:372,KR1h0020_004:34a:10:9:179,KR1h0021_003:14b:4:9:54,KR1h0024_015:15b:6:8:6,KR1h0024_029:7a:6:23:4,KR1h0025_013:11a:8:34:4,KR1h0026_010:15a:9:9:52,KR1h0028_013:25b:3:12:85,KR1h0028_026:17a:3:13:58,KR1h0028_026:17a:5:25:58,KR1h0032_013:5a:7:14:14,KR1h0034_013:22a:8:10:84,KR1h0034_026:13a:2:14:58,KR1h0038_014:15a:3:12:84,KR1h0038_027:9a:2:21:58,KR1h0039_004:32b:10:1:129,KR1h0039_006:29a:9:13:76,KR1h0043_020:7b:9:10:23,KR1h0043_033:19a:8:19:57,KR2k0029_011:34b:7:6:1,KR2k0036_012:14b:2:22:11,KR2k0044_086:9b:5:1:108,KR2k0045_132:13a:2:2:8,KR2k0047_079:82a:1:35:1286,KR2k0067_003:7a:4:18:1,KR2k0070_008:93b:3:17:29,KR2k0070_013:38b:4:21:13,KR2k0071_025:8b:2:20:8,KR2k0071_025:31a:2:11:32,KR2k0089_011:23b:7:9:17,KR2m0015_001:1a:6:13:3,KR2n0029_003:2b:5:9:2,KR2n0029_003:5b:6:17:3,KR2n0029_003:23a:5:2:12,KR2o0022_012:3a:5:5:18,KR3a0031_006:20a:2:1:2,KR3a0061_001:7b:3:9:1,KR3a0094_049:4b:7:17:1,KR3a0094_076:11b:7:5:1,KR3a0094_076:13b:5:14:1,KR3a0094_077:10a:4:19:1,KR3a0105_020:2b:8:9:17,KR3a0110_043:72a:7:17:940,KR3a0110_043:74a:4:14:969,KR3a0110_045:73a:8:16:961,KR3a0110_049:16b:1:13:192,KR3j0185_070:55b:7:9:18,KR3k0025_064:1a:6:9:2,KR3k0055_363:40b:8:7:26,KR4d0073_073:5a:3:2:21,KR4d0073_101:5a:3:2:4941,KR4d0455_004:11b:4:19:6,KR4d0491_010:7b:7:1:5,KR4d0512_015:23b:1:6:17,KR4e0010_015:8a:3:1:4,KR4e0010_015:10a:8:18:4,KR4e0070_067:2a:6:1:4,KR4e00 擇可勞而勞之，¶	KR1d0086_054:30a:2:4:225,KR1g0009_010:11b:3:5:3,KR1h0004_020:8a:20:1:6,KR1h0007_020:5b:4:21:6,KR1h0007_020:6b:3:34:6,KR1h0007_020:6b:4:36:6,KR1h0012_010:19b:2:4:50,KR1h0015_009:8a:1:21:6,KR1h0017_020:7a:4:4:24,KR1h0017_020:8a:8:7:26,KR1h0019_003:83b:9:4:372,KR1h0020_004:34b:1:4:179,KR1h0021_003:14b:5:4:54,KR1h0024_015:15b:7:3:6,KR1h0026_010:15b:1:4:52,KR1h0026_010:16a:1:8:53,KR1h0028_013:25b:4:7:85,KR1h0034_013:22a:9:5:84,KR1h0038_014:15a:4:7:84,KR1h0039_004:32b:10:17:129,KR1h0039_006:29a:10:8:76,KR1h0043_020:8a:1:5:23,KR1h0043_020:8a:8:31:24,KR2f0039_038:23b:6:8:2,KR2k0028_004:94b:5:20:199,KR2k0045_014:51b:8:1:48,KR2k0071_017:22b:7:9:10,KR2k0071_020:76b:2:4:60,KR2k0071_025:29a:6:20:31,KR2n0029_003:5b:7:12:3,KR3a0061_001:7b:4:4:1,KR3a0105_020:3a:1:4:17,KR3j0082_008:26b:7:10:3,KR3j0161_013:35a:1:1:537,KR3j0185_070:55b:8:5:18,KR3k0004_027:3b:2:8:3,KR3k0055_130:8a:4:9:4,KR4c0069_032:7b:3:6:8,KR4c0069_058:7b:3:6:1088,KR4c0069_069:7b:3:6:376,KR4c0069_072:7b:3:6:243,KR4d0244_005:30a:4:14:82,KR4e0091_009:15b:1:7:11,KR4e0203_007:30b:5:3:6,KR4f0062_008:16a:7:7:195,KR4h0116_024:49b:3:10:159,KR4h0132_109:21b:1:12:4,KR4h0145_031:10a:3:3:39
又誰怨？¶

又焉貪？¶

# src: LY 20.02:04; tr. CH
君子無眾寡，¶	KR1h0004_020:8a:24:1:7
無小大，¶
無敢慢，¶

斯不亦威而不猛乎？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_020-14a>¶	KR1d0087_158:57b:3:17:133,KR1g0009_010:11b:5:18:3,KR1g0014_001:5a:3:4:1,KR1h0004_020:8a:31:1:7,KR1h0005_010:11b:5:10:0,KR1h0006_010:19a:8:12:24,KR1h0007_020:5b:8:3:6,KR1h0007_020:6b:8:4:6,KR1h0012_010:19b:4:15:50,KR1h0015_009:8a:4:11:6,KR1h0017_020:7a:6:15:24,KR1h0019_003:84a:2:15:372,KR1h0020_004:34b:3:15:179,KR1h0021_003:14b:7:15:54,KR1h0024_015:16a:1:14:6,KR1h0026_010:15b:3:15:52,KR1h0028_013:25b:6:18:85,KR1h0030_011:3a:8:10:7,KR1h0034_013:22b:2:16:84,KR1h0038_014:15a:6:18:84,KR1h0039_003:48b:4:17:249,KR1h0039_004:33a:2:7:129,KR1h0039_006:29b:2:19:76,KR1h0043_020:8a:3:16:23,KR2n0039_001:32a:6:1:30,KR3a0059_018:48b:3:18:2,KR3a0061_001:7b:6:15:1,KR3a0094_021:12a:6:18:3,KR3a0105_020:3a:3:15:17,KR3j0082_008:27a:1:10:3,KR3j0185_070:56a:2:16:18,KR4f0062_008:16a:9:20:195

# src: LY 20.02:05; tr. CH
子張曰：¶
「何謂四惡？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_020-15a>¶	KR1g0009_010:11b:6:8:3,KR1h0004_020:8a:33:1:8,KR1h0006_010:19b:1:2:24,KR1h0006_010:20b:6:37:24,KR1h0007_020:5b:8:14:6,KR1h0007_020:7a:1:17:6,KR1h0012_010:19b:5:5:50,KR1h0015_009:8a:5:3:6,KR1h0017_020:7a:7:5:24,KR1h0019_003:84a:3:5:372,KR1h0020_004:34b:4:5:179,KR1h0021_003:14b:8:5:54,KR1h0024_015:16a:2:8:6,KR1h0026_010:15b:4:5:52,KR1h0028_013:25b:7:12:85,KR1h0034_013:22b:3:6:84,KR1h0038_014:15a:7:12:84,KR1h0039_004:33a:2:18:129,KR1h0039_006:29b:3:9:76,KR1h0043_020:8b:8:4:25,KR3a0061_001:7b:7:5:1,KR3a0105_020:3b:6:4:23,KR3j0082_008:27a:2:3:3,KR3j0185_070:56a:3:6:18,KR6l0013_019:0651c:7:1:0,KR6q0226_004:0333a:7:19:93
子曰：¶
「不教而殺謂之虐，¶	KR1a0028_002:18b:7:5:1,KR1b0015_003:7a:6:7:0,KR1d0005_013:23a:6:32:1,KR1e0006_001:11a:1:8:1,KR1e0007_001:2a:6:9:1,KR1e0116_002:35b:8:2:1,KR1g0009_010:11b:6:14:3,KR1h0004_020:8a:35:1:8,KR1h0005_010:12a:1:1:0,KR1h0006_010:19b:1:8:24,KR1h0007_020:5b:8:20:6,KR1h0007_020:7a:1:36:6,KR1h0008_002:25a:9:3:147,KR1h0012_010:19b:5:11:50,KR1h0015_009:8a:5:9:6,KR1h0017_020:7a:7:11:24,KR1h0019_003:84a:3:11:372,KR1h0020_004:34b:4:11:179,KR1h0021_003:14b:8:11:54,KR1h0024_015:16a:2:14:6,KR1h0034_013:22b:3:12:84,KR1h0038_014:15a:7:18:84,KR1h0039_004:33a:3:3:129,KR1h0039_006:29b:3:15:76,KR1h0043_020:8b:8:10:25,KR2l0021_001:3a:7:2:124,KR2m0048_002:23b:4:1:8,KR3a0002_005:6a:4:3:1,KR3a0002_009:12b:5:5:1,KR3a0058_025:10b:1:18:84,KR3a0061_001:7b:7:11:1,KR3a0080_107:17b:1:13:109,KR3a0105_020:3b:6:10:23,KR3c0007_005:4a:3:20:6,KR3j0021_003:6a:8:8:7,KR3j0039_004:10b:2:6:8,KR3j0130_000:45b:6:3:40,KR3j0185_003:60b:3:3:25,KR3k0004_041:5b:2:8:8,KR3k0008_093:18a:4:11:13,KR3k0012_492:6a:12:11:8,KR3k0012_999:6a:12:11:11946,KR3k0013_448:1a:6:3:3,KR3k0019_010:43a:4:14:15,KR3k0056_094:26a:3:20:2,KR3k0062_033:20b:1:7:186,KR4d0418_002:10b:1:17:2,KR4d0552_002:20a:8:21:18,KR4f0040_008:19b:3:16:13,KR4h0103_033:3a:3:5:2,KR6i0316_002:0518c:14:8:88

# src: LY 20.03; tr. CH
20.3孔子曰：¶
「不知命，¶
無以為君子也；¶	KR1c0014_001:32a:3:10:198,KR1e0035_010:11b:7:17:107,KR1e0036_011:19b:7:40:4,KR1e0047_023:22b:5:1:2,KR1e0056_005:25b:2:25:1,KR1e0064_009:40a:6:37:186,KR1e0071_013:67a:5:14:3,KR1e0074_013:23b:5:11:2,KR1e0076_013:16b:8:18:1,KR1g0003_024:27b:2:19:66,KR1g0009_010:12a:7:6:3,KR1h0004_020:8a:42:1:9,KR1h0006_010:16a:8:18:23,KR1h0006_010:21a:7:7:25,KR1h0006_010:21b:2:16:25,KR1h0007_020:7a:7:7:7,KR1h0012_010:21b:1:6:52,KR1h0015_009:8b:3:1:6,KR1h0017_001:5b:2:9:9,KR1h0017_001:6a:9:2:10,KR1h0017_020:10a:10:6:29,KR1h0019_003:84b:6:7:374,KR1h0020_004:34b:10:6:181,KR1h0021_003:16b:1:6:56,KR1h0024_015:16a:8:4:6,KR1h0026_010:17b:1:6:54,KR1h0031_025:17b:6:21:51,KR1h0034_004:5a:8:36:12,KR1h0034_004:29b:3:11:56,KR1h0034_013:23b:4:6:86,KR1h0034_013:23b:9:33:87,KR1h0034_013:24a:2:19:87,KR1h0034_013:24b:7:18:91,KR1h0036_001:5a:9:11:12,KR1h0037_002:1a:6:3:3,KR1h0038_014:16a:6:6:86,KR1h0039_001:6a:4:20:35,KR1h0043_001:46b:8:17:53,KR1h0043_020:11a:4:6:27,KR1h0043_020:11a:10:15:28,KR1h0043_020:11b:5:22:28,KR2b0017_041:6a:3:23:1,KR2g0046_004:18a:3:11:11,KR2g0046_059:36a:8:9:1,KR2n0011_155:8a:2:15:58,KR3a0047_050:3a:7:19:5,KR3a0059_033:86b:2:6:9,KR3a0059_033:95a:2:7:9,KR3a0064_038:23a:2:21:28,KR3a0108_019:37b:7:19:62,KR3k0025_051:4b:4:5:4,KR4d0031_019:23b:8:7:17,KR4d0047_010:10b:3:19:4,KR4d0114_001:2b:1:5:2,KR4d0114_001:3a:7:6:2,KR4d0138_121:9a:4:21:15,KR4d0225_006:31a:2:2:32,KR4d0254_011:48a:3:7:1,KR4d0254_011:48b:6:7:1,KR4d0264_029:13b:5:6:2,KR4d0453_002:4a:1:3:1,KR4d0473_042:21a:4:14:11,KR4e0005_007:27a:6:12:24,KR4e0006_005:22a:4:18:25,KR4e0117_005:14b:2:7:38,KR4e0122_011:27a:3:11:1,KR4e0189_005:2b:5:1:4,KR4e0231_024:7b:7:20:9,KR4f0039_006:32a:6:9:6,KR4h0058_045:9a:2:10:6,KR4h0102_038:14a:6:19:16,KR4h0105_001:20a:7:19:8,KR4h0147_055:17a:1:12:19,KR6m0045_002:0300a:19:15:57,KR6q0214_016:0082c:23:10:12,KR6r0148_016:0737c:25:14:16

無以知人也。」	KR1b0019_004:7a:3:11:1,KR1g0009_010:12a:7:22:3,KR1h0004_020:8a:46:1:9,KR1h0005_010:12b:2:4:0,KR1h0006_010:21a:8:14:25,KR1h0006_010:21b:4:35:25,KR1h0007_020:7a:8:11:7,KR1h0012_010:21b:2:1:52,KR1h0015_009:8b:4:26:6,KR1h0017_018:12a:2:9:37,KR1h0017_020:10b:1:1:29,KR1h0019_003:84b:7:2:374,KR1h0020_004:35a:1:1:181,KR1h0021_003:16b:2:1:56,KR1h0024_015:16b:4:3:6,KR1h0026_010:17b:2:1:54,KR1h0028_013:27b:10:4:91,KR1h0032_000:18a:2:3:207,KR1h0032_006:12a:10:10:33,KR1h0032_008:22a:3:20:40,KR1h0034_013:24a:9:4:90,KR1h0036_003:21a:7:15:44,KR1h0036_003:22a:2:2:46,KR1h0038_014:16b:3:4:90,KR1h0039_005:38a:11:4:110,KR1h0043_020:12a:1:4:31,KR2f0038_003:18a:7:2:21,KR2f0039_002:23a:6:1:2,KR2f0039_056:42a:1:3:2,KR2f0039_166:33a:4:3:43,KR3a0047_022:41b:3:14:10,KR3a0047_130:21a:5:10:2,KR3a0058_015:14b:1:6:160,KR3a0108_010:49b:5:14:26,KR3a0108_062:39a:1:10:11,KR3j0051_007:11b:7:15:0,KR4d0045_024:2b:1:11:2,KR4d0045_027:12a:2:21:7,KR4d0045_034:4a:2:10:4,KR4d0123_013:5b:1:15:4,KR4d0253_013:8a:1:8:7,KR4d0253_019:8a:4:8:3,KR4d0253_030:2a:10:14:1,KR4d0253_035:55a:3:4:5,KR4d0254_011:48a:4:2:1,KR4d0254_011:48b:7:2:1,KR4d0516_006:10b:6:12:7,KR4e0144_002:6b:5:14:5,KR4e0231_001:16b:8:10:10,KR4e0231_002:6b:1:3:5,KR4e0244_022:4b:7:19:2,KR4f0062_002:28b:3:17:52,KR4h0002_003:6a:8:31:4,KR4h0003_003:7b:0:18:0,KR4h0132_152:7b:7:12:5,KR4h0147_013:16b:1:7:15
